channel.description: Recent content in achievements on Spatial Group

item.title: Martin promoted to Associate Professor
item.description: Effective from January 2022, Martin has ben promoted to Associate Professor.

item.title: Biogeoref2021 Hackaton win for our team!
item.description: It is with immense pride that we share that our team consisting of Ehsan Hamzei, Kimia Amoozandeh and Kamal Akbari have won the BioGeoRef2021 Hackaton, organised as part of the Spatial Data Science 2021 Symposium.
